summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.4°C) and outside temperature (down 4.1°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 703 m), and light levels (up 4514 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1651 m), and light levels (up 6492 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 703.3m lower than yesterday, 619.5m lower than the past week, 1651.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 1020.9m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

dew point temperature.description:
Today’s average dew point temperature is 2.3°C lower than yesterday, 2.0°C lower than the past week, 1.6°C lower than the past month.

The dew point temperatures yesterday fell between 9.5°C minimum and 15.4°C maximum, with an average of 10.7°C; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 12.7°C and 12.3°C.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Possible light showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and some sunny spells will occur. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
